name: gherkin-assembler
description: Assembling Gherkin ASTs to feature file string

scripts.travis: istanbul cover --include-all-sources ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --root ./lib --report lcovonly -- test/**/*.spec.js -R spec && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | node ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage

author: Laszlo Szikszai <sziklaszlo@gmail.com>
